channel.title: Php on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Php on SoftLayer API

item.title: PHP
item.description: SoftLayer provides a PHP-based API client that takes the heavy lifting out making manual SOAP or XML-RPC calls. To use the PHP-based API client, the following system requirements must be met: PHP 5.2.3 or higher One of the following PHP extensions: SOAP XML-RPC Download the SoftLayer PHP API client from its project page on SoftLayer’s github profile. Once downloaded, extract the PHP API Client to a directory local to your PHP project or into your PHP installation’s include_path.
